properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maa mora naalakinchumu Maharaaja Yesu prabhuvaa Kopamutho nanu joodakumu Kanikaramuna palukumu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}మా మొర నాలకించుము మహారాజ యేసు ప్రభువా కోపముతో నను జూడకుము కనికరమున పలుకుము{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}सुन ले पुकार हमारी, महान शक्तिवाले, कोप अपने में क्यों झिड़के, मीठी जुबान वाले ?{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nin netlu vidanaadedanu praana Priyudaa naa Yesu siluvakujadiya ledu Shramalaku bedura ledu nee nota Dooshana maata okatainanu raaledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paralokamunu vidachitivi paapulakai Ethenchitivi sarva loka rakshanakai Siluvapai shrama nonditivi itti nee Premaku nenu etti dhanamiyyagalanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Samastha lokamunaku neerakhtamu Nitchitivi mooya badina ee thalupu Theeya badenu nee valana ne nela nee Samstutini nirathambu cheyaka poti{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jagamantha nee raakadanu nireekshinchu Chundenu nee neetini neraverchutaku Khyaathiga narudenchitivi nibhadhana Nanusarinchi vimukhtini naa kosagitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raksha kundaa paapulanu shishinchaka Rakshinchu nitya jeevamu nimmu Aatma yandu deenulaku daiva kumaaraa Yesu saarvathrika nivaasi{/lang-eng}
